seo.title: Hostel Brikette → Fornillo Beach walking route
seo.description: Step-by-step directions from the hostel to Fornillo Beach plus tips for the quickest descent and ride back.

linkLabel: Hostel Brikette → Fornillo Beach walking guide
intro: Walking from Hostel Brikette to Fornillo Beach takes about 15–25 minutes on a mostly stepped route. Follow this shortcut to stay on the quickest staircase and paved lane all the way down.

sections.title: Plan your walk
body: Allow around 20 minutes to reach the sand; the time varies with photo stops and how comfortable you are on Positano’s steps.
Google Maps occasionally sends guests through slower detours. Stick with this route to follow the main staircase and smooth roadway the entire way.

sections.title: Route from Hostel Brikette to Fornillo Beach
body: 1. Exit Hostel Brikette and walk down the main staircase to Viale Pasitea.
2. Cross the road and continue straight down the stairs marked with house number 31.
3. Follow the stairs until they meet the road, then turn right and stay on the downhill curve.
4. Walk past the parking garages on both sides and keep right as you approach the Hotel Posa Posa sign.
5. Just beyond the hotel, reach a bend in the road and turn right onto the pedestrian-only path toward Fornillo.
6. Stay on the paved pathway all the way to the beachfront; the shaded finale ends beside Pupetto’s beach club.

sections.title: Getting back up
body: After swimming, continue along the waterfront to Spiaggia Grande and ride the orange internal bus up to Chiesa Nuova if you would rather skip the climb.
Pick up bus tickets at the tabacchi/newsstand beside the Chiesa Nuova stop before you head out or ask reception to confirm stock.

tips: Ride the Interno Positano bus back uphill to avoid the steep return climb.
Carry water for the stair section—there are no shops until you reach the shoreline.
Plan extra beach time with our %LINK:fornilloBeachGuide|Fornillo beach guide% and %LINK:positanoBeaches|Positano beaches overview%.
See how this walk fits into a full trip in the Positano travel overview.

faqs.q: How long does the walk take?
a: Most guests reach Fornillo in 15–25 minutes depending on pace and photo stops. Leaving earlier in the day keeps the stairs cooler.
The shortcut descends several flights from the hostel before switching to a paved lane. Use the bus for the return if you prefer to avoid climbing back up.
